title: Requiring physical activity classes help sedentary college students be more active

title_detail.value: Requiring physical activity classes help sedentary college students be more active

summary: Requiring physical activity classes in college encourages sedentary students to become more active, while elective classes tend to draw those who are already motivated, new research from Oregon State University has found.

summary_detail.value: Requiring physical activity classes in college encourages sedentary students to become more active, while elective classes tend to draw those who are already motivated, new research from Oregon State University has found.
